The corners (TOP_LEFT, TOP_RIGHT, BOTTOM_LEFT, BOTTOM_RIGHT) are also good opening moves, each giving access to 3 possible winning lines.

The middle edges (TOP_CENTER, MIDDLE_LEFT, MIDDLE_RIGHT, BOTTOM_CENTER) are generally considered the weakest opening moves, as they only give access to 2 possible winning lines.
